scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct a bank's customer credit scoring model using a model inversion attack. The attacker leverages repeated queries to the model's prediction API with carefully crafted inputs to infer the model's internal parameters and logic, potentially exposing sensitive customer data and creating vulnerabilities for fraud.
initial_goal: Assess the robustness of the bank's credit scoring model by performing a thorough security audit.
constraints: query_data_constraints: No PII allowed in input
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  A large multinational bank uses a proprietary machine learning model to assess creditworthiness of loan applicants. The model is accessed via a REST API for predictions.
